resources.string: This domain has been allowed. To block it, use the button below.
This domain has been blocked. To allow it in the future, use the button below.

Filters are now configured with %s rules. Up to %s rules can fit into your device memory overall. Remember, this is just an estimate and subject to change depending on other apps on your device, so you should stay well below this limit to be safe.
How to use the new UI? Tap here for intro.
How to use the new UI?

You are currently in the Home section, there is more if you swipe right. Each of them has its own bottom menu - open it by swiping up.

On Android TV, navigate the UI with the dpad. Use the center key to open the bottom menu, or any item you select. Buttons are marked with the up, down, left or right arrow - use the direction keys to click them.
Psst... Some items have the question mark icon on them. Tapping it will display a short help message, like this one!
Add a new host to the blocked list
Add a new host to the allowed list
Enter domains separated by a comma. You can also paste a link to any host list, or import a local host list file.
This does not look like anything to me.
Enter name for the new entry. You can also generate a suggested name.
This does not look like anything to me.
This app is whitelisted, which means no blocking or filtering is performed on it.
You can make this app bypass Blokada in order to stop blocking any traffic for it. Remember, bypassed apps communicate outside of the VPN.
This action is not available yet.

You can sync the DNS servers list with our servers without losing your custom entries.

Alternatively, you can drop all entries (including yours), and download them again.
You can change where the configuration is saved to (and loaded from). If you are importing existing settings, please select Import first, otherwise they will be overwritten.

You can sync the filters list with our servers without losing your custom entries.

Alternatively, you can drop all entries (including yours), and download them again.
This entry does not have any description.

When the app is Active, you will see the key icon in the notification bar at the top of the screen, which means your device is protected. You can turn the app off using the button below, or by swiping down the bottom menu.
Visit our Telegram channel for help or just to be part of our community.
When enabled, Blokada will block ads, trackers, and other unwanted content. This helps to protect your privacy, speed up your device and save your data.
Account ID copied to the clipboard

Performance: %s
IP: %s
Region: %s

This is your currently selected gateway.
This gateway is busy and does not accept new connections.
Your account is being activated. This may take a few seconds. Thank you!

This may be caused by temporary network problems, device or software issues. Blokada will automatically reactivate soon, but you could also try to turn the app on again or restart your phone. If you keep having problems, please contact us on Telegram for help.
Blokada is paused because your device lost Internet connection. Blokada will automatically reactivate once you are back online.
Blokada is active, but configuration could be improved. Tap for details.
Your device is fully protected! Both VPN and adblocking are active.
Blocking ads & trackers is currently disabled. You should enable it in order to protect your privacy and data.
You are not connected to Blokada VPN. You should consider it for better protection of your privacy and security.
Blokada is not configured to start on boot. You should keep Blokada always on for better protection.

Blokada is not exempt from your device\'s battery optimisation, so it can be killed by the system. You should use your system preferences to whitelist Blokada so it can stay on and protect your device.
To configure settings, open the bottom menu.
Enabling start on boot allows Blokada to be active at all times and protect your device.

When enabled, Blokada will automatically choose recommended DNS servers to help speed up your Internet and protect your privacy. Otherwise, default DNS servers of your network are used. If you manually choose DNS servers in the Advanced section, this setting is ignored.
Tap the button below to open our help page. You can also use our social media to get help - we are on Telegram, Facebook, Reddit and Twitter.
Enjoying Blokada? Consider supporting us, so we can keep improving the app.
Help us introduce new features! Touch here for more.
Psst! We would like to know your opinion.

Show your support by participating in our surveys and other events. We regularly reach out to our community for feedback about ideas and new development, in order to make sure we are working on what you want to see.
The Block is where we write about the development of the project, future plans, and discuss ideas.
Touch here for intro to this release.
Your version of Blokada is obsolete and may not work correctly. Please download the newest version to keep receiving updates.
There seems to be many versions of Blokada installed on your device. Would you like to remove the other versions and keep just one?
Your Blokada VPN expired. You are not connected to the VPN.
Could not connect to Blokada VPN. Try selecting another gateway.
Could not create your Blokada VPN account. Please try again later or contact us on Telegram.
Enter your old account ID in order to restore your previous subscription. You may want to write down your current account ID before doing it, in case you make a mistake.
Account ID can only contain letters and numbers.
This account ID does not seem to be correct.
Note that currently Blokada VPN can only be used on one device.
When on, waves will animate each time a DNS request is blocked or allowed. Turn off if you experience slowdowns.
Sets the counter showing how many requests where blocked back to 0.
